languages.text: This weapon has an additional Shove attack action that pushes enemies away. If an enemy cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushed{/g}, the wielder is pushed away instead. This attack deals an additional +wielder's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: This weapon has an additional Shove attack action that pushes enemies away. If an enemy cannot be pushed, the wielder is pushed away instead. This attack deals an additional +wielder's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} damage.

This weapon has an additional Shove attack action that pushes enemies away. If an enemy cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushed{/g}, the wielder is pushed away instead. This attack deals an additional +wielder's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

This weapon has an additional Shove attack action that pushes enemies away. If an enemy cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushed{/g}, the wielder is pushed away instead. This attack deals an additional +wielder's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

languages.text: 此武器拥有额外的猛推攻击动作，可以将敌人推开。如果敌人无法推开，则装备者会被{g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}推开{/g}。猛推攻击会造成额外{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，等同于使用者的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}。
languages.original_text: This weapon has an additional Shove attack action that pushes enemies away. If an enemy cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushed{/g}, the wielder is pushed away instead. This attack deals an additional +wielder's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 此武器拥有额外的猛推攻击动作，可以将敌人推开。如果敌人无法推开，则装备者会被推开。猛推攻击会造成额外伤害，等同于使用者的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}。

languages.text: この武器には敵を{g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}押しのける{/g}ための突き飛ばし攻撃のアクションが追加されている敵が押すことができない場合、代わりに使い手が押される。この攻撃はさらに+使い手の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える。
languages.original_text: This weapon has an additional Shove attack action that pushes enemies away. If an enemy cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushed{/g}, the wielder is pushed away instead. This attack deals an additional +wielder's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: この武器には敵を押しのけるための突き飛ばし攻撃が追加されている敵を押すことができない場合、代わりに使い手が押される。この攻撃はさらに使い手の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}ダメージを与える。

languages.text: Это оружие позволяет совершить дополнительное атакующее действие Оттесняющий удар, отталкивающее противников. Если {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}оттолкнуть{/g} противника невозможно, вместо этого смещается сам персонаж. Эта атака наносит +{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}ЛВК{/g} персонажа {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} дополнительно.
languages.original_text: This weapon has an additional Shove attack action that pushes enemies away. If an enemy cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushed{/g}, the wielder is pushed away instead. This attack deals an additional +wielder's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Это оружие позволяет совершить дополнительное атакующее действие Оттесняющий удар, отталкивающее противников. Если оттолкнуть противника невозможно, вместо этого смещается сам персонаж. Эта атака наносит +{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}ЛВК{/g} персонажа урона дополнительно.

Это оружие позволяет совершить дополнительное атакующее действие Оттесняющий удар, отталкивающее противников. Если оттолкнуть противника невозможно, вместо этого смещается сам персонаж. Эта атака наносит +{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}ЛВК{/g} персонажа урона дополнительно.

languages.text: Esta arma tiene una acción de ataque adicional, Empujón, que aleja a los enemigos. Si no es posible {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}empujar{/g} a un enemigo, el portador puede alejarse con el empujón. El ataque inflige +{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} del portador de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} adicional.
languages.original_text: This weapon has an additional Shove attack action that pushes enemies away. If an enemy cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushed{/g}, the wielder is pushed away instead. This attack deals an additional +wielder's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Esta arma tiene una acción de ataque adicional, Empujón, que aleja a los enemigos. Si no es posible empujar a un enemigo, el portador puede alejarse con el empujón. El ataque inflige +{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} del portador de daño adicional.

languages.text: Diese Waffe hat eine zusätzliche Stoß-Angriffsaktion, die Feinde wegstößt. Wenn ein Feind nicht {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}weggestoßen{/g} werden kann, wird stattdessen der Träger der Waffe weggestoßen. Dieser Angriff verursacht zusätzlich +Waffenführer-{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}BEW{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}.
languages.original_text: This weapon has an additional Shove attack action that pushes enemies away. If an enemy cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushed{/g}, the wielder is pushed away instead. This attack deals an additional +wielder's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Diese Waffe hat eine zusätzliche Stoß-Angriffsaktion, die Feinde wegstößt. Wenn ein Feind nicht weggestoßen werden kann, wird stattdessen der Führer der Waffe weggestoßen. Dieser Angriff verursacht zusätzlich +Waffenführer-{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}BEW{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} Schaden.

languages.text: Cette arme possède une action d'attaque Poussée supplémentaire qui repousse les ennemis. Si un ennemi ne peut pas être {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}repoussé{/g}, l'utilisateur l'est à sa place. Cette attaque inflige +{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} de l'utilisateur points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}.

This attack deals an additional +wielder's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
